name: Pork, Pear and Walnut Salad
author: mwmaleski
summary: Sauteed pork is served with crisp sliced pear and walnuts over a bed of fresh spinach and drizzled with balsamic vinaigrette.
ingredients: 1 pound pork tenderloin, cut into 1 inch cubes
½ cup balsamic vinaigrette salad dressing, or to taste
directions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add the pork and parsley; cook and stir until pork is browned on the outside, and cooked through
Remove from the heat and set aside
Make a bed of spinach on individual serving plates or on a large platter
Arrange slices of pear over the spinach
Top with the cooked pork and sprinkle with walnuts
Drizzle the balsamic vinaigrette over the whole salad
